TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: A helper that generates outfits for a Sim. The tunables control aspects of randomization, such as tags, weights, overrides, etc...

TunableList.name: blocked_tags
TunableList.description: The set of prohibited tags used to generate the outfit. Parts must not match the specified tag in order to be valid for the generated outfit.

TunableList.name: body_type_chance_overrides
TunableList.description: Define body type chance overrides for the generate outfit. For example, if BODYTYPE_HAT is mapped to 100%, then the outfit is guaranteed to have a hat if any hat matches the specified tags. If used in an appearance modifier, these body types will contribute to the flags that determine which body types can be generated, regardless of their percent chance.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The chance that a part is applied to the corresponding body type.

TunableList.name: body_type_match_not_found_policy
TunableList.display: Body Type Match Not Found Policy
TunableList.description: The policy we should take for a body type that we fail to find a match for. Primary example is to use MATCH_NOT_FOUND_KEEP_EXISTING for generating a tshirt and making sure a sim wearing full body has a lower body cas part. If used in an appearance modifier, these body types will contribute to the flags that determine which body types can be generated.

TunableList.name: filter_flag
TunableList.description: Define how to handle part randomization for the generated outfit.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The set of tags used to generate the outfit. Parts must match the specified tag in order to be valid for the generated outfit.
